title: Meta being sued by ex-Facebook content moderator
description: The man worked in Kenya, and says he was paid under £2 an hour to review posts including beheadings.

title: Crypto crash: Stablecoin collapse sends tokens tumbling
description: The sudden demise of TerraUSD sends other crypto-coins into a downward spiral.

title: Apple iPod creator warns the metaverse will encourage trolls
description: Tony Fadell says the virtual reality world risks damaging human interaction and creating toxicity.

title: Apple loses position as most valuable firm amid tech sell-off
description: Saudi Arabian energy giant Aramco has taken the top spot amid a broad sell-off of technology stocks.
